snippet: An Israeli soldier died of heatstroke after completing a half-marathon, prompting an Israeli official to criticize organizers for allowing the race to take place during a heat wave.
abstract: Israeli soldier dies of heatstroke after completing half-marathon in Tel Aviv, prompting Israel's minister of public security to criticize organizers for allowing race to take place in 90 degree temperatures.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli soldier died of heatstroke after completing a half-marathon, prompting an Israeli official to criticize organizers for allowing the race to take place during a heat wave.

headline.main: Israel: Cabinet Minister Criticizes Decision to Run Race in Heat Wave
headline.print_headline: Israel: Cabinet Minister Criticizes Decision to Run Race in Heat Wave
